Frequently Asked Questions

What is CoinStack?

CoinStack is a cryptocurrency wallet that allows users to store, send, and receive digital currencies securely.

Is CoinStack free to use?

Yes, CoinStack is free to download and use. Some transactions may incur minimal blockchain fees.

What cryptocurrencies does CoinStack support?

We support major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and many more. New coins are regularly added to the platform.
